member.name: M:Dotmim.Sync.HttpInterceptorsExtensions.OnHttpResponseFailure(Dotmim.Sync.Web.Client.WebRemoteOrchestrator,System.Action{Dotmim.Sync.HttpResponseFailureArgs})
member.summary: Registers an action to be executed when a remote HTTP request made by the orchestrator fails.
member.param: The action to execute upon encountering a failed HTTP response.
member.remarks: This extension method allows for the convenient registration of actions to handle failed HTTP responses during remote orchestration. Upon failure, the specified action is invoked with details about the HTTP response. This can be useful for implementing custom error handling, logging, or retry logic.

member.summary: Gets or Sets the last datetime when a sync has successfully ended.

member.summary: Gets or Sets the last timestamp a sync has occured. This timestamp is set just 'before' sync start.

member.summary: Gets or Sets the last server timestamp a sync has occured for this scope client.

member.name: T:Dotmim.Sync.Web.Client.WebRemoteOrchestrator
member.summary: Contains the logic to apply changes to the server and get changes from the server.
Contains the forbidden logic to handle batch info on the server side.
Contains the forbidden logic to handle constraints on the server side.
Represents a web remote orchestrator able to communicate with a web server orchestrator.
Contains the logic to get changes from the server side.
Contains the forbidden logic to handle metadata on the server side.
Contains the logic to get the hypothetical override operation from the server.
Contains the forbidden logic to handle provisioning on the server side.
Contains the forbidden logic to handle schema on the server side.
Contains the forbidden logic to handle scope info clients on the server side.
Contains the logic to handle scope info on the server side.
Contains the logic to handle session on the server side.
Contains the logic to handle snapshot on the server side.
Contains the logic to handle timestamp on the server side.
Contains the forbidden logic to handle upgrade on the server side.
Apply changes.

member.name: M:Dotmim.Sync.Web.Client.WebRemoteOrchestrator.InvokeResponseFailureInterceptors(System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage,System.String)
member.summary: Invokes response failure Interceptors to handle unsuccessful HTTP responses. This method triggers interception logic to process and respond to failed HTTP responses, allowing for centralized error handling and customization.
member.remarks: Response failure Interceptors provide a mechanism for executing custom logic when an HTTP response indicates failure (non-success status codes). Interceptors may include logging, error handling, retry logic, or other actions to be taken upon encountering failed responses from API calls.

member.name: T:Dotmim.Sync.HttpResponseFailureArgs
member.summary: Represents the arguments provided when an HTTP response fails.
member.remarks: This class encapsulates the details of a failed HTTP response, including the status code, reason phrase, error content, headers, and the URI of the original request.

member.name: M:Dotmim.Sync.HttpResponseFailureArgs.#ctor(System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Uri)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified parameters.
member.param: The HTTP status code of the failed response.
The reason phrase associated with the HTTP status code.
The content of the response body providing additional details about the error.
A dictionary containing the HTTP headers associated with the failed response.
The URI of the original request that resulted in the failed response.

member.name: P:Dotmim.Sync.HttpResponseFailureArgs.StatusCode
member.summary: Gets the HTTP status code of the failed response.

member.name: P:Dotmim.Sync.HttpResponseFailureArgs.ReasonPhrase
member.summary: Gets the reason phrase associated with the HTTP status code.

member.name: P:Dotmim.Sync.HttpResponseFailureArgs.ErrorContent
member.summary: Gets the content of the response body providing additional details about the error.

member.name: P:Dotmim.Sync.HttpResponseFailureArgs.Headers
member.summary: Gets the HTTP headers associated with the failed response.

member.name: P:Dotmim.Sync.HttpResponseFailureArgs.RequestUri
member.summary: Gets the URI of the original request that resulted in the failed response.
